hivis.interact

Interface Parametrised

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ViewTableSeriesParametrised, ViewTableSeriesParametrisedSelect

    public interface Parametrised
    Interface to an object or process that may be controlled via a set of Parameters. Note that it is up to the implementation of Parameter and Parametrised to handle communication between these. The typical pattern is to create an inner class for the Parametrised object that extends Parameter.
    Author:
    O. J. Coleman

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getParameterLabels

        ListSet<java.lang.String> getParameterLabels()
        Get the set of parameter labels. This should usually be an unmodifiable view.

      • getParameters

        ListSet<Parameter<?>> getParameters()
        Get the set of parameters. This should usually be an unmodifiable view.

      • getParameter

        Parameter<?> getParameter(java.lang.String label)
        Get the parameter with the specified label.

      • addParameterChangeListener

        void addParameterChangeListener(ParameterListener listener)
        Add the given ParametersChangeListener to this Parametrised object. The listener will receive ParameterListener#parametersChanged(ParametersChangeEvent) notifications when a Parameters value changes or Parameters are added or removed.

      • removeParameterChangeListener

        void removeParameterChangeListener(ParameterListener listener)
        Remove the given ParametersChangeListener from this Parametrised object.
